contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title prefixed|3}} Three [[ship]]s of the [[United States Navy]] have been named '''USS ''Wichita''''', after the city of [[Wichita, Kansas]]. * {{USS|Wichita|CA-45}} was a [[heavy cruiser]] commissioned in 1939 and active in [[World War II]]. * {{USS|Wichita|AOR-1}} was a [[replenishment oiler]] in service from 1969 to 1993; technically AOR-1 was named for both the city and the Wichita River. * {{USNS|Wichita|LCS-13}} is a planned {{sclass-|Freedom|littoral combat ship|2}} {{Shipindex}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Wichita, Uss}} [[Category:United States Navy ship names]]
